analysis.key_quote: Please provide a sensitivity analysis showing net benefits if separation rates rise by 1 %, 5 %, and 10 % of the 45,000-employee cohort—incorporating onboarding, clearance re-investigation, and lost human-capital costs.
analysis.rationale: The comment primarily requests information and analysis regarding cost-benefit accounting without expressing a clear stance for or against the proposed rule. It focuses on specific financial implications rather than civil service themes.
